local_intent: Move above red_plate, align, lower until contact, release plate, and retreat
assumptions: red_plate is detectable and within reach
contact sensor calibrated and contact on red_plate will be detected
coherence_with_global: Implements the GLOBAL_BT transfer phase: perception (DetectObject), MoveAbove(red_plate), approach/alignment, LowerUntilContact, OpenGripper, and Retreat consistent with GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION.
